entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpStress is broken on Windows (CAP_SYS_PTRACE) #76045
    8.0.0
  • SslStress: SocketException (995) WSA_OPERATION_ABORTED in most Windows runs #76044
    8.0.0
  • Intermittent failure in CriticalFinalizer test #76041
    8.0.0
  • msbuild segfault on arm64 linux package restore #76039
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RefSafetyRulesAttribute #76032
    8.0.0
  • Out Of Memory From Pinned byte[] used in SslStream #76029
  • DateTime.ParseExact randomly yielding wrong DateTime.Kind #76037
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnly empty collection singletons #76028
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128:ExtractMostSignificantBits on ARM64 and AMD64 #76025
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Base64.IsValid #76020
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm Crashes if another wasm instance is running in the service worker. #76026
    6.0.11
  • System.Net.Security.Tests - Helix timeout on Mono #76019
  • [ProfilerAPI] No more ModuleLoadFinished callbacks for dynamic modules #76016
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-mathematical expression #76015
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing Dictionary by object key #76014
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing `Dictionary` by `string` key #76013
    8.0.0
  • DateTimeOffsetAdapter::ToString unused parameter #76012
    Future
  • Distributed Transactions (MSDTC) code blocking on disposal of Transaction Scope #76010
  • Stable Dictionary sorting for System.Text.Json #76008
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Char> #76027
  • Permissions in ZipArchive Missing on Linux - Regression in .Net 7 RC1? #76006
  • [NativeAot] ComWrappers don't work on Linux #76005
    8.0.0
  • SQLException.Number property differs on Linux OS and Windows. #76004
  • build-android-rootfs.sh Must be fix the "termux" URL #76002
  • Cannot evaluate. Expression 'System.Data.NameNode' is not an aggregate #76001
    Future
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/generics/Monitor/EnterExit14/EnterExit14.sh #75997
    7.0.0

Closed

  • COM event with recursion .net 6 problem #73754
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.sh #44341
    Future
  • CodeGen constructor called with invalid theCompiler argument #73089
    Future
  • [Feature Request] System.Text.Json: Built-in Converter of Serializing/Deserializing generic ObservableCollection<T> properties of custom classes #75977
  • Please add Empty to ReadOnlyCollection<T> #41147
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] inline CORINFO_HELP_TYPEHANDLE_TO_RUNTIMETYPE #49429
    8.0.0
  • XmlSerializerTests fail in NativeAOT runs #76018
  • Kerberos Authentication failure in HTTP Client in Linux (.NET6) #75951
  • Configuring Console Json Formatting with JsonWriterOptions doesn't work with Trimming #73822
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console failures #73436
    8.0.0
  • dnSpy: Assertion failed '(varDsc->TypeGet() == TYP_I_IMPL) && lcl->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #74259
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime failed to load #76009
  • Distributed transactions: AccessViolationException on arm64 #74170
    7.0.0
  • critical_finalization tests fails with GCStress=0x3 #75782
    8.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] Issues related to overlapped IO #75828
    8.0.0
  • Redundant load-acquire elimination discrepancy between CoreCLR and Clang #47261
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure gc collects memory for CriticalFinalizer test #76046
    community-contribution
  • Improve List<T>.AddRange performance for enumerables #76043
    area-System.Collections
  • Optimized StreamPipeReaderInternal InternalTokenSource getter #76042
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix issue with unreachable blocks in redundant branch opt #76040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set `AppHostSigningException.ExitCode` #76038
    area-HostModel
  • [workloads] Work around main still targeting net7.0 #76036
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76035
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76034
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Prefer specific instances instead of gshared for methods … #76033
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Ensure that frozen objects respect the minimum object size #76031
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Removing short name column from compphases.h #76030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add back missing conv opcodes when compiling via System.Linq.Expressions #76024
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [wasi] prevent mono on wasi from crashing on GC #76023
    area-GC-mono
  • [MONO][TEST] Update issues.targets for CheckProjects tests #76022
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Smarter ordering of late args based on register uses #76017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add and utilize number of contexts with diffs #76011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix not to create unnecessary `thread_params` #76007
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some extra static arrays used in Split() #76003
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to use latest sdk, and target net8.0 #75998
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cache dynamically generated RSA keys in tests #75995
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Remove usages of Ubuntu 16.04 from pipelines #75513
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Initial unification of DynamicMethod to be shareable between runtimes #75829
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update 6.0 dotnet install quality #75722
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Fix critical finalization test #75952
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve "vec == Vector128<>.Zero" #75999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [Mono] Restore old code to solve the recent SpanHelpers regressions #75996
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #75863
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: improve scalability of optReachable #75990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update owner/mentionees for System.Transactions #76021
    area-Meta
  • Update area owners #75975
    area-Meta
  • Preserve last error for patchpoint helpers #75922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Configuring Console Json Formatting with JsonWriterOptions doesn't work with Trimming #75943
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Delete more verification code #72747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `GTF_VAR_CAST` #74461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update solution files under src/libraries #75988
    area-Meta
  • Clean-up InteropServices.JavaScript project file #75962
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0] Update RateLimiting ref assembly #75978
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Enable doc generation for source-build #75985
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Restore old code to solve the recent SpanHelpers regressions #75917
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance

Updated

  • Only R2R blittable IL stubs that aren't inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Ensure regions never use more than 99% of the heap hard limit #75038
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: properly update trees in optOptimizeBoolsGcStress #75992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Fold SIMD-typed partial access to locals; delete base types from vector constants #74580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disallow TimeSpan.Zero in rate limiters #75496
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/6.0] Allow for null XmlSerializers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #75638
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #75643
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Make sure we at least sweep the loh even when we wanted to compact it #74626
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Outerloop fix for libraries #74468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Avoid recommitting the mark array #75208
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Join the special sweep decision #75572
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Use UTF8 encoding on Tar string fields #75902
    area-System.IO
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75913
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Update compiler build #75935
  • Audit MemoryExtensions.IndexOf variants #75754
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources (#75163, #75441) #75521
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Add missing DynamicallyAccessMembers attributes to System.Data.Common/ref #75980
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Support a few "shifted register" operations on Arm64 #75823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Publish hostcommon static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Clean up of SPC to match ref assembly public surface for Mono and CoreCLR #75954
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Support create, debugging and running wasmbrowser template from VS #75986
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Issue #75070 - Add PriorityQueue DequeueEnqueue Method #75993
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Runtime.InteropServices tests #75669
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove hardcoded limit in deserialization constructor arguments #75982
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • remove explicit LangVersion from a few projects #75806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 AndNot intrinsic for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
